snippet: Alcoa reported strong earnings, and the central bank laid plans to end its bond-buying program in October.
abstract: Corporate earnings season gets off to positive start, helping lift stock market after two days of decline.
lead_paragraph: Alcoa reported strong earnings, and the central bank laid plans to end its bond-buying program in October.

headline.main: Earnings and Fed News Help Shares Rebound
headline.print_headline: Earnings and Fed News Help Shares Rebound
